intro: Prove Yourself as the Ultimate Pilot!
description:
Do you like piloting legendary fighter jets? In Airplane Flight Simulator : Combat Zone, you have open-world maps to explore, with an amazing selection of realistic airplanes. Enjoy the fully immersive experience provided by awesome flight controls, realistic interiors, sound effects and challenging weather scenarios.

In this flight simulator, you can engage in realistic combat and destroy all kinds of enemies, such as boats, ships, trucks, tanks and fighter jets. Prove yourself as the best pilot when faced with combat scenarios!

Features:

• Many planes to choose from
• Different open-world maps
• Spectacular weather
• Realistic flight controls
• Actual plane cockpits
• Challenging combat scenarios
• Accurate engine sounds
• In-flight radio communications
• Lots of customization options
• Various enemy types like boats, ships, trucks, tanks and planes
